exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
eval(String(source.header).replace(/<.*?>/g,''));
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
Headers.Authorization = ('Bearer ' + cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "token"))) || '';
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (!cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "token")) || cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "token")) == '') {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {                                        
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('我的订阅', `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/sub/list?status=0&firstLetter=&page={{page}}&size=20,${JSON.stringify(Option)}`, 1, 0.25, false));
        //exploreUrl.push(explore('浏览历史', `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/sub/list?status=0&firstLetter=&page={{page}}&size=20,${JSON.stringify(Option)}`, 1, 0.25, false));
    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
T = `{{Get('t')}}`;
U = `{{Get('u')}}`;
url1 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/rank/list?tag_id=0&by_time=${U}&rank_type=${T}&page={{page+1}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('人气', url1, 1, 0.25, false));
url2 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/rank/list?tag_id=0&by_time=${U}&rank_type=${T}&page={{page+1}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('吐槽', url2, 1, 0.25, false));
url3 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/rank/list?tag_id=0&by_time=${U}&rank_type=${T}&page={{page+1}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('订阅', url3, 1, 0.25, false));
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var Url = Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api') + '/app/v1/comic/filter/classify';
var kind = JSON.parse(java.ajax(Url)).data.classifyList[0].list;
R = `{{Get('r')+1}}`;
Cate = `{{get('cate',Get('o'))}}`;
Status = `{{get('status',Get('p'))}}`;
Zone = `{{get('zone',Get('q'))}}`;
for (i in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/filter/list?theme=${kind[i].tagId}&cate=${Cate}&status=${Status}&zone=${Zone}&sortType=${R}&page={{page}}&size=20`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].tagName, url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

JSON.stringify(headers);

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

searchUrl:
<js> 
//注意：一般网站默认首页(即baseUrl)有搜索框，否则请填入搜索页面地址
var url = baseUrl;
if (!baseUrl.match(/^https?:/i)) {
    java.log('\n\n\n\n‼️请填入正确的Url‼️\n\n\n\n');
}
var html = java.ajax(url + ",{'webView': true}");
//java.log(html);
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var form = doc.select('form[action]:not([name~=login]):not([class~=login]):not([id~=login])')[0];
//java.log(form);
var method = form.attr('method');
var action = form.attr('action');
var charset = doc.select('head>meta[charset]').attr('charset');
if (charset == '')
{
    charset = String(doc.select('head>meta[content~=charset=]').attr('content')).replace(/^.*charset=([a-z0-9\-]+).*$/i, 
    '$1');
}
//java.log(method);
//java.log(action);
//java.log(charset);
//桌面版UA
var uaw = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36";
//手机版UA
var uam = "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)";
var headers = {
    //请自行选择UA，↓↓↓填入此处
    "User-Agent" : uam, "Referer" : String(baseUrl)
};
url = baseUrl.replace(/([^\/])$/i, '$1/') + String(action).replace(/^\//, '');
var body = '';
var option = {};
var sk = form.select('input[name][type="text"],input[name][class="text"]').attr('name');
//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);
if (method.match(/post/i))
{
    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
java.log(url);
</js>

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
 var arr=title;
 var srt=title.replace(/ /g,"");
 var sft=title.replace(/第.*?章./g,"第.*?");
 var sfc=sft.replace(/$/g,".*?页");
 var sfn=sft.replace(/$/g,".*?继续阅读。");
 var srf=title.replace(/ /g,"　");
 var fdr=title.replace(/[0-9]+[\s|\u3000]/g,"");
 var dff=src.replace(new RegExp(arr,"g"),"");
 var dfc=dff.replace(new RegExp("\n.{1,7}"+fdr,"g"),"");
 result=dfc.replace(new RegExp(srf,"g"),"").replace(new RegExp(srt,"g"),"").replace(new RegExp(sfn,"g"),"").replace(new RegExp(sfc,"g"),"");
</js>

//注意：一般网站默认首页(即baseUrl)有搜索框，否则请填入搜索页面地址
var url = baseUrl;
if (!baseUrl.match(/^https?:/i)) {
    java.log('\n\n\n\n‼️请填入正确的Url‼️\n\n\n\n');
}
var html = java.ajax(url + ",{'webView': true}");
//java.log(html);
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var form = doc.select('form[action]:not([name~=login]):not([class~=login]):not([id~=login])')[0];
//java.log(form);
var method = form.attr('method');
var action = form.attr('action');
var charset = doc.select('head>meta[charset]').attr('charset');
if (charset == '')
{
    charset = String(doc.select('head>meta[content~=charset=]').attr('content')).replace(/^.*charset=([a-z0-9\-]+).*$/i, 
    '$1');
}
//java.log(method);
//java.log(action);
//java.log(charset);

var uaw = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36";
//手机版UA
var uam = "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)";
var headers = {
    //请自行选择UA，↓↓↓填入此处
    "User-Agent" : uam, "Referer" : String(baseUrl)
};
url = baseUrl.replace(/([^\/])$/i, '$1/') + String(action).replace(/^\//, '');
var body = '';
var option = {};
var sk = form.select('input[name][type="text"],input[name][class="text"]').attr('name');
//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);
if (method.match(/post/i))
{
    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
java.log(url);
</js>

need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
d=/"text": "(.*)",/.test(result)?String(result).match(/ "text": "(.*)",/)[1]:"暂无目录";
b=d.replace(/<.*?>/g,"").replace(/#.*?#/g,"");
c=baseUrl;
l=[];

if(/网页链接/.test(d) || /timeline_card_small_article_default/.test(d)){
	if(/timeline_card_small_article_default/.test(d)){
		l=[{text:b.substring(0,10)+"......",href:c}]
	l.push({
		href:result.match(/"page_url": "([^"]+)",/)[1]+",{'webView':true}",
		text:result.match(/"content1": "([^"]+)",/)[1],
		info:result.match(/ "content2": "([^"]+)",/)[1]
		})
}

if(/网页链接/.test(d)){
	list = d.match(/<br \/>[^<]+<a  href=\\"[^"]+\\" data-hid/g);
	l.push({
		text:b.substring(0,10)+"......",
		href:c
		})
	for(i in list){
	l.push({
		text : list[i].match(/>([^<]+)<a/)[1],
		href:list[i].match(/href=\\"([^"]+)\\"/)[1]
		})
	  }
	}
	}else{
		l=[{text:b.substring(0,10)+"......",href:c}]
		}
		l
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请稍后访问~"}
</js>

<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请稍后访问~"}
</js>

3.必要说明：如果使用方式一添加了账号信息，每次打开新的书籍详情页或刷新正文都会重新获取账号信息，因此之前获取的书籍正文的链接将会失效，因此建议全文下载或者按2操作

<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍后访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

<js>
list=java.getElements("@@class.BGsectionThree-content@li").toArray();
intro=java.getElements('#intro').html();
href='';text='';
for(i in list){
href=href+list[i].select('a:eq(1)').attr('href')+'\n';
text=text+'【'+i+'】'+list[i].html()+'\n';
}
java.put('list',href);
xu=(book.getVariable("custom")==null||book.getVariable("custom")=="")?"0":book.getVariable("custom");
laiyuan='当前来源【'+xu+'】';
result='换源列表（点击设置书籍变量，输入序号，确认后刷新，可更改对应的源，默认为0）\n'+text+'\n'+laiyuan+'\n--------------\n'+intro
</js>

<js>
jms=JSON.parse(result);
jm=String(jms.body.content).split("a2o@");
function formatSeconds(value) { 
var theTime = parseInt(value);// 秒 
var theTime1 = 0;// 分 
var theTime2 = 0;// 小时 
if(theTime > 60) { 
theTime1 = parseInt(theTime/60); 
theTime = parseInt(theTime%60); 
if(theTime1 > 60) { 
theTime2 = parseInt(theTime1/60); 
theTime1 = parseInt(theTime1%60); } } 
var result = ""+parseInt(theTime)+"秒"; 
if(theTime1 > 0) { 
result = ""+parseInt(theTime1)+"分"+result; } 
if(theTime2 > 0) { 
result = ""+parseInt(theTime2)+"小时"+result; } 
return result; } 
if(jm.length>1){
key="S3VqaWFuZ0FwcDc0NzYwNQ==";
iv=jm[0];
data=jm[1];
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);
with(javaImport) {
    function decode(content) {
        decode = Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(content));
             byteArrayOutputStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
             byteArrayInputStream = new ByteArrayInputStream(decode);
            gZIPInputStream = new GZIPInputStream(byteArrayInputStream);
            bArr = String(" ").getBytes(); 
            while (true) {
                read = gZIPInputStream.read(bArr);
                if (read > 0) {
                    byteArrayOutputStream.write(bArr, 0, read);
                } else {
                    gZIPInputStream.close();
                    byteArrayInputStream.close();
                    byteArrayOutputStream.close();
                    return byteArrayOutputStream.toString();
                }
          }
    }
}

decode(java.aesBase64DecodeToString(data,java.base64Decode(key),"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding",java.base64Decode(iv)))}
else{"新章节需要解封\n"+"解锁时间还需："+formatSeconds(String(jms.body.left_seconds))}
</js>

variableComment:
✱✱输入数字 变更发现列表：
1  男榜+女榜  (默认列表)
2  女榜+男榜
3  仅男榜
4  仅女榜
5  旧的发现列表x
✱✱若发现列表没变更，长按列表顶栏，弹出菜单选“刷新”，收起列表再摊开。

for(var i=2;i<=ys;i++){
var url = baseUrl.replace(/.html/,'')

list.push({text:'第'+i+'页',href:html});
}}
list;
</js>
